pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides Tools for Working with General Simplicial Complexes // Provides an interface to a Simplex Tree data structure, which is a data structure aimed at enabling efficient manipulation of 'simplicial' complexes of any dimension. The Simplex Tree data structure was originally introduced by Jean-Daniel Boissonnat and Clment Maria (2014) doi:10.1007/s00453-014-9887-3.
